page.title: 17A day at school:EMMA.
page.content: At 9:15am the bell rings.I go into the classroom and give out the hymn books to the rest of the class.We all file into the main hall and prepare for assembly.We sing a hymn,listen to a story and end by having prayers. 9:35am.Lessons start.I have my spelling test,followed by mental arithmetic.We then all continue with our English Grammar.10:25am.Lessons stop and we are given our milk.10:30am.I buy a packet of potato crisps and go out to play.Today I play a game of tag. 10:50am.We come into class and continue with our craft projects.I have just completed my model robot, made from papier mache,an egg box and card tubes.12:00.Tidy up,wash hands and prepare for lunch.
